page.title: 10REDHILL AERODROME
page.content: { {Redhill Aerodrome}consists of the {Tiger Club, Bristows Helicopters}and {Redhill Flying Club}.It is owned by the {Commonwealth and Shipping. {The Tiger Club}opened in{1952}and was first called the{Tiger Moth Club because that was the only type of plane that was flown then.Some famous members are{Derek Griffiths,Duke of {Edinburgh}and{Prince Andrew. At{Bristows Helicopters}there are {18}Helicopters and{8}pilots. There are {9}hangars and{6}buildings. Some of the helicopters are:{Bell 47, Wessex 60X, {Sikorski S76A and Puma AF. {Redhill Flying Club}gives flying and navigation training and you can get your{P.P.L. (Private Pilots {Licence)}there.It is the only organisation like it in the{world.
